data.message:
I'm not a fan of Drake or Kayne West 
I am kinda Stan
that's why I feel so blessed
your music helped me when my life was a mess
I used to write your songs on my school desk
I still do that shit
and I'm not ashamed of it
Everyday of my life was a Knockout
yo Em you know what I am talking about...
